divs: sighting detailsduring the fireworks, 7 fireballs flew across the sky, 1 at a time, a few minutes apart. they were orangy\red\yellowish and no tails. they faded to black. they appeared to travel northwest to south east===location, long island, ny. they only flew during the fireworks. i was hoping it was just a meteor shower, but unsure that it was. they made me a little nervous. i never saw anything like that.
Summary: 7 orange fireballs flew across the sky and faded to black.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Malverne
There were no other sightings in Malverne on or around July 4th 2009
